message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.THEORY. 

The paper deals with the specification of programming language semantics, which falls under the category of Programming Languages (cs.PL). The use of status flags to represent divergence and abrupt termination is a logical approach that could also be relevant to Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO) and Software Engineering (cs.SE). The paper also presents a novel approach to representing these concepts, which could be of interest to Formal Languages and Automata Theory (cs.FL) and Theoretical Computer Science (cs.THEORY).
